EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We will be conducting sibling photographs on 15th June. Parents who wish to purchase the sibling photograph should simply fill in the form below for booking:
Siblings photograph form / Absent students / Retake form
Prices:
RM80 (includes 1x8R, 2x5R, 4x4R and 8x wallet size)
Deadline for orders/payment:
26th June
We will get the order envelope and photo sample distributed by Friday 22nd June to pupils. Parents need to return the order envelope with payment at Primary Reception before 26th June.
Please note that orders will not be completed if the payment/envelope is not received before 26th June.
Please remind your children to bring their full school attire/blazers on 15th June for the photoshoot. Children in Years 3 and 4 will have their pictures taken in the afternoon, after Sports Day.
For students who were absent for the previous individual photograph session, these pictures can also be taken on the same day. Kindly fill in the same form
Thank you.
Kind regards, Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
